statements: SELECT * FROM security_policies ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT policy_name, access_level FROM security_policies WHERE access_level = 'Admin';
SELECT id, policy_name FROM security_policies WHERE policy_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM security_policies ORDER BY policy_name ASC;
SELECT id, access_level FROM security_policies WHERE access_level = 'User' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM security_policies WHERE access_level = 'Admin' ORDER BY policy_name DESC;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM security_policies WHERE id > 100 AND access_level = 'User' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM security_policies WHERE policy_description IS NOT NULL AND policy_name LIKE '%Important%';
SELECT id, policy_name, access_level FROM security_policies WHERE id BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY access_level ASC;
SELECT * FROM security_policies WHERE access_level = 'Manager' OR access_level = 'Supervisor' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM security_policies;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM security_policies;
SELECT acl_name FROM access_control_lists;
SELECT acl_name, permissions FROM access_control_lists WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM access_control_lists ORDER BY acl_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM security_policies WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM security_policies ORDER BY policy_name DESC;
SELECT acl_name, permissions FROM access_control_lists WHERE permissions LIKE '%read%' AND permissions NOT LIKE '%write%' ORDER BY acl_name ASC;
SELECT security_policies.policy_name, access_control_lists.acl_name FROM security_policies JOIN access_control_lists ON security_policies.policy_id = access_control_lists.policy_id;

SELECT policy_id, COUNT(acl_id) AS acl_count FROM security_policies LEFT JOIN access_control_lists ON security_policies.policy_id = access_control_lists.policy_id GROUP BY policy_id HAVING acl_count > 1 ORDER BY acl_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM SecurityPolicies;
SELECT policy_name, created_at FROM SecurityPolicies;
SELECT acl_id, table_name FROM AccessControlLists WHERE access_level='admin';
SELECT * FROM UserRoles WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT role_name FROM UserRoles ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM SecurityPolicies;
SELECT id, policy_name, policy_description FROM SecurityPolicies WHERE id > 5 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT acl_id, table_name, access_level FROM AccessControlLists WHERE access_level = 'admin' LIMIT 10;
SELECT role_id, role_name, description FROM UserRoles WHERE description LIKE '%manager%';
SELECT * FROM SecurityPolicies UNION SELECT acl_id, table_name, permission, created_at FROM AccessControlLists ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE UserID = 1;
SELECT Username, Email FROM Users WHERE Username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT PolicyName, PolicyDescription FROM SecurityPolicies WHERE PolicyID > 100 ORDER BY PolicyID DESC;
SELECT UserID, Username, Email FROM Users JOIN AccessControlLists ON Users.UserID = AccessControlLists.UserID WHERE AccessLevel = 'Admin';
SELECT GroupName FROM UserGroups WHERE GroupID IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM SecurityPolicies WHERE PolicyID = 1;
SELECT PolicyName, PolicyDescription FROM SecurityPolicies WHERE PolicyID = 2 ORDER BY PolicyName ASC;
SELECT UserID, Username FROM Users WHERE Email LIKE '%gmail%' ORDER BY Username DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT u.Username, ac.AccessLevel FROM Users u JOIN AccessControlLists ac ON u.UserID = ac.UserID WHERE ac.PolicyID = 3;
SELECT DISTINCT ug.GroupName FROM UserGroups ug JOIN Users u ON u.GroupID = ug.GroupID WHERE u.UserID = 4;
SELECT * FROM security_policies;
SELECT policy_id, policy_name FROM security_policies WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, resource_id, access_level FROM access_control_lists WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1002;
SELECT resource_name, resource_type FROM resources WHERE resource_type = 'Database';
SELECT * FROM security_policies WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT resource_name, resource_type FROM resources WHERE resource_id = 3;
SELECT role_name, role_description FROM roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, resource_id, access_level FROM access_control_lists WHERE user_id = 10 AND access_level = 'ADMIN';
